<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of KB Categories">352e39ad9769b6d0ec453b90f053af6e</child><cloned>2025-12-01 07:37:23</cloned><last_validated>2025-12-01 07:37:23</last_validated><parent display_value="KB Categories">122ac7f0d7101200a9addd173e24d411</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>kb</category><client_script/><controller_as/><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list>color</field_list><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>KB Categories</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[// populate the 'data' object
var t = new GlideRecord('kb_category');
gs.print("kb_knowledge_base: " + $sp.getValue('kb_knowledge_base'));
t.addQuery('parent_id', $sp.getValue('kb_knowledge_base'));
t.query();

data.categories = [];
while (t.next()) {
  var articles = $sp.getKBCategoryArticles(t.getUniqueValue());
  //if (articles.length == 0)
  //  continue;
  
  var category = {
    'value' : t.getUniqueValue(),
    'label' : t.getValue('label')
  };
  data.categories.push(category);
}]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-12-10 22:34:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>122ac7f0d7101200a9addd173e24d411</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>KB Categories</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">49e443e50ca432108bb2ce4d4ed10ecf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_122ac7f0d7101200a9addd173e24d411</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-24 18:55:37</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="panel panel-{{options.color}} b">
  <div class="panel-heading">
	<h4 class="panel-title">${Categories}</h4>
  </div>
  <div class="panel-body">
    <div ng-repeat="a in data.categories | orderBy:'label'" class="m-b">
      <a href="?id=kb_category&kb_category={{::a.value}}">{{::a.label}}</a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-01 07:37:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>752e39ad9769b6d0ec453b90f053af73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>352e39ad9769b6d0ec453b90f053af6e</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AAYOS" source="x_1868112_aayos">992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AAYOS">992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_752e39ad9769b6d0ec453b90f053af73</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-01 07:37:23</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
